website_summaries.verdict: The insanely sleek 12-inch MacBook is still the lightest Apple laptop, but competing Windows laptops have caught up in thinness, weight, and screen quality.
pros: Available in four colors including Rose Gold
cons: Limited connectivity with a single USB-C port, and no adapters are included
Shallow keyboard and Force Touch trackpad take some getting used to
Internal upgrades can only be made at initial purchase

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: This was a great bargain, saving around £500 on new price. Advertised as refurbished - Apple recognised it and registered it as new.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Downie

customer_reviews.title: Faulty board in laptop, stopped working after 14 months Apple demanded £620 to fix defect
customer_reviews.text: After 14 months became non functional and despite travelling to two Apple services Centres and wasting hours waiting for them not to fix it ultimately the Apple shop in Cardiff demanded £620 to repair the faulty Apple board inside. Genuinely shocked at Apples reliability and attitude to resolving problems with their products. Luckily we had bought this product from Amazon who offered a full refund on the spot thus reinforcing the belief in their brand.
customer_reviews.author: Vj

customer_reviews.title: Great product, make my life as a student so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, make my life as a student so much easier. MacBook is fast, lightweight and easy to use and great valve for money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well known faulty product.
customer_reviews.text: Product have a Logic Board Premature Failure, Apple have full knowledge of this issue and should place a recall for this faulty product but keeps selling it and Amazon won’t help at all the customer and just affirm it is a warranty issue. These machines will die within 15-18months after purchase and Apple will require nearly 70% of cost price to repair knowing its faulty in advance. Plenty evidence online to cover the issue. DO NOT BUY I’ve lost my money and all my personal pictures due to this and all Amazon had to say was: sorry. Disappointed with all.
customer_reviews.author: Ed's Bar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but am not persuaded by the power plug/output socket.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Faulty, now I need to pay more than it's actual value to solve the problem. I think that seller bought a lot of faulty products and sold it on Amazon. Such a shame.

customer_reviews.text: Small screen takes a little while to get used to but all good in every other respects.
customer_reviews.author: Fred T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Slim
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Slim. Lovely colour gold. Seems fast enough. Obviously, the retina screen, for which I wanted it for is like - just that! Early days yet so I am still having to feel comfortable with it. Cannot figure out how to do a slide show from an SD card or Flash drive without having to download it onto the laptop??? Meanwhile, it has O.K. streetcred (sic)
customer_reviews.author: B. R. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It looked amazing but didn't deliver. I returned it because 1 week after delivery it just stopped working, wouldn't turn on or boot up. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Christocalena

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard awful - Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Worst Apple product I have ever owned, in over 25 years. The keyboard is appalling, constantly fails to register characters - Had the whole thing replaced once and it soon started again. For a product so expensive this is just unacceptable. It’s an obvious design flaw yet they won’t admit it. Am out of warranty now and it would cost me an absolute fortune for a fix that I would have no confidence in working for more than a month or two. Probably my worst buy of all time. Avoid at all costs is my advice.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, underperformed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I bought my MacBook Air (11 inch / 2016) but sadly have found it rather tedious to deal with. My main reason for purchasing was for good internet speed, lightweight body and many many people marveling over it??... Finding documents is not easy, my GMail has always displayed oldest emails first and won't display newest first, there is no right click for quick access eg printers. To find the printer defaults is tiresome. All in all - I would have been better buying something cheaper when I wouldn't have been so disappointed. I won't go on as others seem to love this device. Thinking of selling as not used much.
customer_reviews.author: Skater

customer_reviews.title: Serious thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought a MacBook years ago... don't know how I did without it. Light, quick and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Foley

customer_reviews.title: Screen and keyboard are great. Size unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Got my MacBook for Christmas. I have used it every day since. Screen and keyboard are great. Size unbelievable. Very very fast. The single USB-C works very well. 100% recommend. (This is my first Apple machine and I'm hooked)
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 1.5years
customer_reviews.text: The logic board failed after 1.5 years. Repair is £580 and all data is lost as the hard drive is fixed to the logic board and cannot be removed.
